sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import Flex from 'common/components/Flex' import Text from 'common/components/Text' const Confirmation = ({ data }) => { const { firstName, lastName, nickname, email, phoneNumber, conDisease, allergicFood, } = data.userInfo[0] const { shirt, shirtSize } = data.eventInfo[0] const interests: string[] = [] for (const data in eventInfo[0]) { if (eventInfo[0][data] === true) { topics.forEach((topic: string) => { if (slugify(topic, { remove: /[()./]/g, lower: true }) === data) { interests.push(topic) } }) } } return (
User Info First name: {firstName} Last name: {lastName} Nickname: {nickname} Email: {email} Phone number: {phoneNumber} Congenital disease: {!conDisease ? '-' : conDisease} Allergic food: {!allergicFood ? '-' : allergicFood} Event Info Interested Topic: {interestedTopic} {shirt === 'yes' && Shirt size: {shirtSize}} {shirt === 'no' && No shirt}
) } export default Confirmation
